Title: Braves' Travis Demeritte: Outrighted off roster
Description: Demeritte was outrighted to Triple-A Gwinnett on Sunday. Demeritte was claimed off waivers from the Tigers in mid-February but didn't last long on his new team's 40-man roster. He'll remain an organizational depth option in Atlanta but is now one step further from returning to the big leagues.
Author: CBSSports.com
